games.title: Bow Brawls
games.description:
Bow Brawls – Top-Down Archery Battles!

Enter Bow Brawls, a thrilling archery survival game where you aim with drag controls that feel like a real bow. Pull, release, and strike down endless waves of enemies! Each wave ends with a powerful boss fight, forcing you to master skill and strategy.

Unlock 5 unique bows, 5 armors, and 5 arenas as you progress. Every weapon and battleground adds a new style of play. Face bosses with special abilities and prove your reflexes in intense battles.

Compete with players worldwide through global leaderboards. Show off your best scores and climb to the top to become the ultimate archer.

Perfect for casual players, kids, and competitive gamers, Bow Brawls is easy to pick up yet challenging to master. Endless action, exciting unlocks, and competitive spirit await you.

🎯 Aim true. ⚔ Defeat bosses. 👑 Rule the leaderboard.
Play Bow Brawls now and test your archery skills!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play

In Bow Brawls, survive endless waves of enemies using skill and precision. Use the joystick (mobile) or WASD (PC) to move. Aim by pulling the on-screen joystick in the opposite direction of your target—release to shoot arrows like a real bow.

Enemies attack from all directions, including melee fighters and ranged shooters. Every few waves, a boss appears with unique skills like dashing, jumping over you, or launching projectiles—stay alert and adapt!

Defeat bosses to earn gems, which unlock new bows and armors with different abilities. Reach higher scores to unlock new arenas and face tougher challenges.

Your score is based on enemy kills, with each type rewarding different points. Climb the leaderboards by defeating as many enemies as possible. Manage your health bar carefully—you only get one life per run.

Master your aim, survive waves, defeat bosses, and rise as the ultimate archer!

games.description: Defend your kingdom in this epic online tower defense strategy game! Command warriors, cast spells, and battle fantasy monsters. Build your army and lead the conquest - action and adventure await!
games.howToPlayText:
Don't let enemies destroy your castle!
Destroy the enemy castle by buying soldiers with in-game coins!

games.title: Battle Hamsters
games.description: You play as a squad of fighting hamsters. You need to destroy the enemy squad. Take turns shooting at the enemy, unlock new levels, hamsters and locations.
games.howToPlayText: Take turns shooting, control is simple: Click with your mouse (desktop) or hold your finger on the screen (mobile).

games.title: Bullet Echo
games.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo — Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero’s abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
games.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero’s unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero’s special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero’s special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

games.title: Angry Checkers
games.description: Angry Checkers is a thrilling take on the traditional board game, where players try to eliminate opponents’ checkers. Available on multiple platforms, it features various play modes including multiplayer and single-player. This action-packed game delivers engaging and strategic fun for everyone without requiring downloads or sign-ups.
games.howToPlayText:
Physics based action game, where your goal is to knock off all enemy checkers from the board. 

Tap or click one of your checkers and drag it to the direction you want the checker to go. 

You are in full control of the direction and power of your checker move.

games.description: Dive into the exciting world of "Legions: Way of War," a real-time strategy game that tests your tactical skills. Lead your troops to success by expertly positioning them and utilizing your heroes. Enjoy this captivating blend of strategy and competition on any device!
games.howToPlayText: To win, arrange and connect the squads correctly. Develop your army and get new types of troops: archers, cavalry, infantry, artillery and Heroes. To enjoy the game, pass all the tests.

games.title: Obby: Warriors of The Sword
games.description:
Become a hero in Obby: Warriors of The Sword! Collect powerful swords, defeat enemies and unlock new abilities! Go through rebirth and become a legend. Get stronger, pump up your hero and become the best in this exciting game!

Key Game Features:

⚔️ Epic Battles: Upgrade your hero, unlock new abilities and fight unique enemies! 🕹️

💥 Sword and Artifact Collection: Buy, upgrade and collect different swords to create the strongest hero with powerful weapons! 🗡️💎

💪 Allies and Reborn: Make loyal allies and go through rebirth, becoming even stronger and opening new battle opportunities. 🤝🔄

😎 Endless customizations: You can choose from a variety of skins, pets and jewelry to make your hero unique and truly stylish! 🎨🐾✨

👑 Missions and Challenges: Complete exciting missions, unlock new levels and get rare rewards. 🎯🏅
games.howToPlayText:
💻Desktop:

WASD - Movement
LMB - Take a hit
Space - Jump
RMB and mouse movement - Camera rotation

📱 Smartphone:

Movement - Joystick on the left side of the screen
Rotate the camera - Finger movements on the right side of the screen
Click on the screen - Take a shot

Enjoy tactical combat as you use tanks and helicopters to succeed in this skill-testing military challenge—no registration needed.
games.howToPlayText: Select a base to move or attack, click once for half the troops, twice for all, and remember that moving between ground and air bases requires double the troops.

games.title: shrinkzone.io
games.description: Welcome to Shrinkzone, a lightning-fast, doodle-style battle royale where survival depends on your appetite! Start off as a tiny blob and devour food scattered across the map to grow larger and stronger. But beware — other players are doing the same. Use quick reflexes and clever movement to avoid the giants and hunt down the weak. As the shrinking safe zone forces players closer together, only the smartest and hungriest will survive. Are you ready to dominate the arena and claim the top spot?
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard
• Move – WASD 

Mobile
• Move – On-screen joystick

games.title: EdgeFire
games.description:
EdgeFire is a fast-paced online shooter that throws you into thrilling battles against real players from around the world. Whether you're flying solo or teaming up with friends, every match is a chance to prove your dominance on the battlefield.

Sharpen your aim and unleash lightning-fast reflexes, earn rewards, and become the top player in each round. Outsmart your opponents with clever tactics and strategic plays that turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Dive into action-packed gameplay with a variety of stunning skins that enhance your experience and appeal to both seasoned shooter veterans and newcomers alike. Each battle is a fresh challenge, packed with intensity and adrenaline.

Step into the arena, test your skills, and rise to glory. Are you ready to dominate the fight?
games.howToPlayText:
WASD - move
R - reload
Left mouse button - shoot
Esc - pause menu

games.title: Hot Rods Arena Stars
games.description:
Welcome to the arena where the weak don’t survive!

Take the wheel of a legendary, heavily armed Hot Rod and challenge dozens of ruthless opponents.

Here, there are no rules — only speed, firepower, and your reflexes decide who becomes the champion. Blast enemies with precise shots, collect stars, and unlock powerful upgrades for your battle beast.

Swap weapons, reinforce your armor, hit top speed, and leave nothing but smoke and wreckage behind!

Every arena is a new challenge, where only those willing to take risks can claim victory.

Ready to prove you’re the king of the road? Then hit the gas and race toward glory!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
W, A, S, D — drive your car

Mobile:
Movement — use the left stick (up, down, left, right)

Goal:
Collect stars to outscore your rivals. Use your weapons wisely — blow up enemies, trap them, and don’t give them a chance to strike back. One mistake, and your car becomes scrap metal!

games.title: Madness: Ward number 6
games.description:
In this game you are a patient of a psychiatric hospital.

- Upgrade your character by leveling up.

- Try your luck in the rat race.

- Fight with other patients.

- Buy weapons, skins and pets.
games.howToPlayText:
Management:

- By tapping/clicking on the buttons

Fight with other patients and bosses to level up. After several battles, you will get a new level and points to upgrade your character.

In battles, the chance of dealing critical damage is completely random and its power depends on the "Madness" characteristic.

games.title: Survivor Tournament
games.description:
Добро пожаловать на Турнир выживших - захватывающее приключение в мире, разрушенном зомби-апокалипсисом! Участвуйте в напряженных битвах на динамичных аренах, вооружая и экипируя своего воина, чтобы противостоять безжалостным испытаниям. Эта игра предлагает захватывающий опыт, в котором вы должны собирать различные предметы и стратегически улучшать своего бойца, превращая его в сильнейшего игрока.

Овладейте искусством слияния и стратегии! Собирайте сбалансированное снаряжение, тщательно комбинируйте предметы и аккуратно используйте свой инвентарь, чтобы оптимизировать силу своего воина. Путешествуйте сквозь хаос, открывая редкие и эпические предметы, каждый из которых открывает новый потенциал и силу.

Присоединяйтесь к Турниру выживших сегодня и погрузитесь в волнующее путешествие выживания и завоеваний. Сможете ли вы принять вызов и стать абсолютным чемпионом в мире, наводненном нежитью? Ваша судьба ждет вас: приготовьтесь к битве, соберите ресурсы и раскройте истинную силу своего воина! Приключения, стратегия и слава манят вас в этом захватывающем турнире на выживание. Скачайте сейчас и начните свой путь к победе!
games.howToPlayText:
Как играть:
Покупайте предметы, объединяйте одинаковые предметы, чтобы улучшить их характеристики.  Складывайте предметы в инвентарь, собирайте комплекты, чтобы получить дополнительные бонусы харектиристик. Все предметы вашего инвентаря участвуют в битве!  Битва происходит автоматически. 
И пусть победит сильнейший!

games.title: Cowboys Duel
games.description: Enter the rugged world of the Wild West in *Cowboys Duel*, where sharp aim and quick reflexes are crucial. Compete in solo missions or face off against friends in thrilling duels. Customize your character, enjoy various game modes, and hone your skills to become the top cowboy.
games.howToPlayText:
- Click on the menu and open the game

- Just Click when you want to shoot

- Watch the clock and shoot when it is 12, if you shoot before you will lose

- Click on the arrows before time runs out to turn them in the direction shown

- Download 20 Targets before time runs out

- The one who scores 3 wins.
